*547Stockton & Ulmer, for Appellant; Anderson <& Anderson, for Appellee.

Meredith Lumber Company, a corporation, in its own name and in the names of J. P. Middlemas and Estelle S. Middlemas, his wife, James Menzies and Mary E. Menzies, his wife, T. C. White and C. McC. Davis, Appellants, v. Joseph Dixon Crucible Company, a corporation, Appellee.
